message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first. I think it would be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $12,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,000
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $7,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $10,000.  I think that's a fair price considering the value this product offers.
I'm still not sure if I'm willing to go up to $10,000. How about $8,500?
